this_title: Joseph Pulitzer: Voice of the People
trans_title: 约瑟夫·普利策：民众之声
introduction: Joseph Pulitzer spoke of "fake news" over 100 years ago and fought the dangers that the suppression of news had for a democracy long before our present threats to press freedom. His heroic battles have been forgotten along with anything we might learn from the tools he deployed against his enemies.
chinese_title: 约瑟夫·普利策：民众之声
foreign_title: Joseph Pulitzer: Voice of the People
